attributes.action: Stop Military Uniforms from being removed from public because of some minorities
attributes.background: We continually learn from the media that our serving personnel are asked to remove their uniform in case it offends minorities eg aeroplanes, retail environments, hospitals. It is not an offence to serve our country and we should be proud and grateful that people make this sacrifice on our behalf.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109521
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
